message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $110 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with right now. I'd be willing to pay $105 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $105. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $112.50.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  I'm still aiming to stay under $110. Would you consider $107.50?  It's a fair price for both of us.
Hi Bob, I understand your concern about staying under $110. I'm willing to make another adjustment. I can sell the product to you for $109.50. It's a good compromise that still benefits both of us.
